kuuu—!"},{"lineNumber":239251,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽しかったねーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":" That was fun—!"},{"lineNumber":239252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔剣カオスは手に入れてー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We got the Demon Sword Chaos—,"},{"lineNumber":239253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オーブもゲットしてー、","translatedEnglishLine":" also got the orb—,"},{"lineNumber":239254,"originalJapaneseLine":"　のんびりお祭りも楽しんでー」","translatedEnglishLine":" and leisurely enjoyed the festival—\""},{"lineNumber":239255,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、完璧だね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it’s perfect.\""},{"lineNumber":239256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「楽しかったも何も、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fun or not,"},{"lineNumber":239257,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんた毎日酒飲んでるだけだったじゃないの」","translatedEnglishLine":" you were just drinking sake every day.\""},{"lineNumber":239258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、あとハニ子になるとか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, and also becoming Haniko or something.\""},{"lineNumber":239259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハニ子はもうごめんだなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m done with being Haniko already...\""},{"lineNumber":239260,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしても、＜エール＞はすごかったねぇ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, <Eiru> was amazing."},{"lineNumber":239261,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ねえ？　スシヌ？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Right? Sushinu?\""},{"lineNumber":239262,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うんっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":239263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞ちゃんすごかった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eiru>-chan was incredible..."},{"lineNumber":239264,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんな大っきい人に立ち向かっていって……」","translatedEnglishLine":" She stood up to such a big person...\""},{"lineNumber":239265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch\""},{"lineNumber":239266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、あれだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, you know,"},{"lineNumber":239267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雑魚の一般人は邪魔でしかないな。","translatedEnglishLine":" the weak commoners are just a nuisance."},{"lineNumber":239268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつか俺らだけでやるか」","translatedEnglishLine":" Someday let's do it just the two of us.\""},{"lineNumber":239269,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、いいでござるねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, that sounds good."},{"lineNumber":239270,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウズメ出なかったけど、","translatedEnglishLine":" Uzume didn’t appear, but"},{"lineNumber":239271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　試合見てたら、ちと後悔」","translatedEnglishLine":" watching the matches made me a bit regretful.\""},{"lineNumber":239272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あたしは闘神大会は二度とごめんよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As for me, no more Fighting God Tournaments ever."},{"lineNumber":239273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":239274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあ、乱義」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Rangi."},{"lineNumber":239275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしたんだい、元就」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What’s wrong, Motonari?\""},{"lineNumber":239276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうして！　オレは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why!? I—"},{"lineNumber":239277,"originalJapaneseLine":"　闘神大会に参加してない！？」","translatedEnglishLine":" didn’t participate in the Fighting God Tournament!?\""},{"lineNumber":239278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、どうしてだろうね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I wonder why...\""},{"lineNumber":239279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気づけば全部終わっていたぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Before I knew it, it was all over!\""},{"lineNumber":239280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははぁ〜ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaan...\""},{"lineNumber":239281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「狐の仕業か！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was it the fox’s doing!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":239282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうかもねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe so.\""},{"lineNumber":239283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「スゲェ適当に答えてる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re answering so casually...\""},{"lineNumber":239284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":239285,"originalJapaneseLine":"一行を見ていたアームズが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms, who had been watching the party,"},{"lineNumber":239286,"originalJapaneseLine":"小さく溜め息を吐きだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"let out a small sigh."},{"lineNumber":239287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どうかしただすか、アームズさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Is something wrong, Arms-san?\""},{"lineNumber":239288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No..."},{"lineNumber":239289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　賑やかだと、な・・・」","translatedEnglishLine":" it’s just that when it’s lively..."},{"lineNumber":239290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞に乞われて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At <Eiru>'s request,"},{"lineNumber":239291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も同行することとなったが……","translatedEnglishLine":" I also came along...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君はまだ若い。
これからいくらでも強くなるだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You will surely become much stronger from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「五年後、また戦おうではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's fight again five years from now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男、アレキサンダーはにっこりと、
初めてあなたに優しい微笑みを浮かべた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the first time showing you a gentle smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『負けてしまったとはいえ、
＜エール＞選手も素晴らしい戦いぶりでした！』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the player <Eiru> also showed a wonderful fight!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『皆様、この白熱した戦いを見せてくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Everyone, please give your hearty applause to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の戦士に惜しみない拍手をお願いします！』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two warriors who gave us this heated battle!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耳が痛いほどの歓声と拍手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cheering and applause were so loud it hurt the ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 揺れる地面。
照りつける眩しい日差し。
こうして……
あなたの闘神大会が終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your Fighting God Tournament came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達一行が街道をのんびりと歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You and your party were leisurely walking along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んっ、くーーーーっ！
楽しかったねーー！」
「魔剣カオスは手に入れてー、
オーブもゲットしてー、
のんびりお祭りも楽しんでー」
「いや、完璧だね」
「楽しかったも何も、
あんた毎日酒飲んでるだけだったじゃないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were just drinking sake every day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、あとハニ子になるとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, and also becoming Haniko or something."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハニ子はもうごめんだなあ……」
「それにしても、＜エール＞はすごかったねぇ。
ねえ？　スシヌ？」
「う、うんっ！」
「＜エール＞ちゃんすごかった……
あんな大っきい人に立ち向かっていって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She stood up to such a big person..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッ」
「しかし、あれだな。
雑魚の一般人は邪魔でしかないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the weak commoners are just a nuisance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつか俺らだけでやるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday let's do it just the two of us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、いいでござるねー。
ウズメ出なかったけど、
試合見てたら、ちと後悔」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: watching the matches made me a bit regretful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あたしは闘神大会は二度とごめんよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As for me, no more Fighting God Tournaments ever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ……」
「なあ、乱義」
「どうしたんだい、元就」
「どうして！　オレは！
闘神大会に参加してない！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: didn’t participate in the Fighting God Tournament!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、どうしてだろうね……」
「気づけば全部終わっていたぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before I knew it, it was all over!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははぁ〜ん……」
「狐の仕業か！！！！」
「そうかもねぇ」
「スゲェ適当に答えてる……」
一行を見ていたアームズが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, who had been watching the party,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さく溜め息を吐きだした。
「？　どうかしただすか、アームズさん」
「いや……
賑やかだと、な・・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s just that when it’s lively...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞に乞われて、
私も同行することとなったが……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「五年後、また戦おうではないか」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, who had been watching the party,
